entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 8:24 PM EST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High zero.
